divs: sighting details8\3\12: i was driving west on highway 8, passing yuma, az. at approx. 4am, i noticed 3lights approx. 3-4 miles away, moving around over the highway and over to the right side of the highway in almost a figure 8 shape. it's like the lights were dancing and moving in unison. my first initial thought was a crazy pilot in a small plane, crop-dusting because the 3 lights always moved together - i thought the center light was a nose light and the outer lights were wing lights. as i quickly approached the lights, i noticed no distinctive shape, just brightness of the lights w\ a shade of red\blue-ish glow around them. the lights eventually zipped by on the passenger's side w\o no distinctive sound or vibration. it literally whizzed by in an-almost silent mode. when i looked back and in the right mirror, approx. 1\4 mile after it passed me, one light went completely vertical and the other two lights maneuvered in a almost hairpin turn, and headed approx. north-west... disappearing, or as if the lights were turned off.
Summary: 3 lights moving near solar panel field-AZ
